snippet: Didier Deschamps, who as a player was the captain of the French team that won the 1998 World Cup and 2000 European Championship, was named the coach of France’s troubled national team.
lead_paragraph: Didier Deschamps, who as a player was the captain of the French team that won the 1998 World Cup and 2000 European Championship, was named the coach of France’s troubled national team.

headline.seo: Former French Captain Didier Deschamps to Coach National Team
headline.main: Former French Captain to Coach National Team
headline.print_headline: Former French Captain To Coach National Team
